testcase.name: lets call a file
testcase.system-out: * print "In temp folder and calling 03_myJson.json from /first " ......... passed And def BodyOfRequest = read('classpath:first/03_myJson.json') ............ passed * print BodyOfRequest.email ............................................... passed

testcase.name: lets try calling a feature
testcase.system-out: * print "In temp folder and calling 03_myJson.json from /first " ......... passed And def BodyOfRequest = read('classpath:first/03_myJson.json') ............ passed * print BodyOfRequest.email ............................................... passed * print "In temp folder and calling 01_test.feature from /first " ........ passed And def BodyOfRequest = call read('../first/01_test.feature') ............. passed * print "BodyOfRequest title from first request ----->",BodyOfRequest.response[0].title . passed
